name: OZorkAuth
description: Play the classic text-based game - Zork I - using standard OAuth2 authorization flows.

STORMPATH_API_KEY_ID.description: The API key ID from your ~/.stormpath/apiKey.properties file

STORMPATH_API_KEY_SECRET.description: The API key secret from your ~/.stormpath/apiKey.properties file

STORMPATH_APPLICATION_HREF.description: The URL for your Stormpath Application from the Stormpath Admin Dashboard
